billhistory.lastaction: 02/16/2017 H Referred to Homeland Security & Public Safety: Feb 16 2017 11:33AM
billhistory.caption: Relating to the removal of a fee for the issuance of an original, duplicate, modified, or renewed license to carry a handgun.
